title: Deco Font
content:
Can anybody ID this? I've found many that have similarities such as Plaza and Xctasy but I have been unable to nail it down. The lowercase "y" seems to be the most difficult to find. I don't particularly like the font but I need to use it to recreate something.

Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023225316im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CLG008_5813.jpg)
author: J-Gray

comments.content:
[Mike's Bauhaus Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023225316/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces1.html) has this listed as Design Demi. Not sure if there's a digital version.

- Lex

Thanks for the ID, that is definitely it. Now I just need to find it. Was I incorrect in calling it Art Deco?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023225316im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DesignDemi_3470.gif)
Does anyone have any insight on where to find this. I'm coming up empty.
